h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: The main path leads up a slope to the left of the Shrine, and then to a large rock-filled forested area further left that you can ignore if you keep on the main path up to the Warding Temple where the last boss of this area is.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Snow-Veiled Trail'.
The content is as follows:
The main path leads up a slope to the left of the Shrine, and then to a large rock-filled forested area further left that you can ignore if you keep on the main path up to the Warding Temple where the last boss of this area is.
